title: Product
description: XDM product name or title, master product, and key attributes of product in the product catalog.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: The internal unique ID of the product in the commerce backend system.

SKU.title: SKU
SKU.description: The unique SKU (stock keeping unit) of the product assigned by the vendor.

description.title: Description
description.description: The localized description of the product.

category.title: Category
category.description: Primary categorization or category name of the product.

department.title: Department
department.description: Primary department the product is associated with.

masterProductID.title: Master product identifier
masterProductID.description: The internal unique ID of the product in the commerce backend system.

masterProductSKU.title: Master product SKU
masterProductSKU.description: The unique SKU (stock keeping unit) of the master product assigned by the vendor or manufacturer.

masterProductName.title: Master product name
masterProductName.description: The localized name of the product.

fabrication.title: Fabrication
fabrication.description: Primary material of the product construction.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: Gender the product is marketed to.

size.title: Size
size.description: Standard product size for the product.

unitOfMeasure.title: Unit of measure
unitOfMeasure.description: Standard unit of measure of the product and or variation and relates the units for the size measurement.

countryOfOrigin.title: Country of origin
countryOfOrigin.description: The two-character [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://datahub.io/core/country-list) code for the country of origin of the product as defined by customs requirements.

COGS.title: Cost of good sold
COGS.description: Cost of good sold, in the `currencyCode` currency.

listPrice.title: List price
listPrice.description: Default price of the product before sales and discounting, in the `currencyCode` currency.

currencyCode.title: Currency code
currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code used for cost and pricing, including `listPrice` and `COGS`.

originalSaleDate.title: Original sale date
originalSaleDate.description: First date the product was made available for sale. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

productCreateDate.title: Product creation date
productCreateDate.description: The date when this product was created. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

productLastModified.title: Product last modified
productLastModified.description: The date when this product was last modified. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

productURL.title: Product URL
productURL.description: The URL for the primary product view of the product page.
